name: Hillstone WP SSO
author: Hillstone

sections.description: This plugin provides single sign-on capabilities for Hillstone web sites using Hillstone user center authentication(OAuth 2.0).
sections.installation:
Automatic installation

  1. Log into your WordPress admin
  2. Click Plugins
  3. Click Add New
  4. Search for Hillstone SSO
  5. Click Install Now under “Hillstone SSO”
  6. Activate the plugin

Manual installation

  1. Download the plugin
  2. Extract the contents of the zip file
  3. Upload the contents of the zip file to the wp-content/plugins/ folder of your WordPress installation
  4. Activate the Hillstone WP SSO plugin from ‘Plugins’ page.
